project1.title: Imagine Out Loud: Front-End Capstone
project1.description: Imagine Out Loud is an app built to encourage families to read-aloud together. The application is designed for use by a parent, or an older child who will track books being read and the amount of time that is read-aloud. A user will be able to add or edit a book that they add to their collection as well as add or delete a recorded time. Imagine Out Loud is built in React, JavaScript, CSS and HTML.

project2.title: Sports-Roster
project2.description: A Project that allows the user to view,edit, and add players to the Nashville Predators NHL team.

project3.title: Sandwich Maker
project3.description: This project allows a user to select sandwich items and view a final price.

project4.title: Nutshell Star-Destroyer
project4.description: A project that explores fetching and displaying firebase data. Allows the user to add edit and delete information from the Star Wars Imperial Database.
